Northern Ireland Emergency Care Waiting Times

ni_waiting_times.Rd

Emergency care waiting times for departments (hospitals) in Norther Ireland Health & Social Care Trusts.

Usage

ni_waiting_times

Format

A data frame containing 8 columns.

trust18_code

Health and Social Care Trust code

trust18_name

Health and Social Care Trust name

department

Department name

date

Date

total

Total attendances

under_4_hours

Attendances with waiting times under 4 hours

between_4_12_hours

Attendances with waiting times between 4 and 12 hours

over_12_hours

Attendances with waiting times over 12 hours

Source

https://datavis.nisra.gov.uk/health/ni-emergency-care-waiting-times-data-oct-dec-24.html#table
